roleset.name: socially ill at ease, overly aware of oneself
roleset.note: SELFCONSCIOUS-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-4,5, conscious.01. (from selfconscious.01-j)

role.descr: specific aspect of self focused on

example.name: concatenation and relemmatization required
example.text: If this works well I would definitely buy one , I hate shaving and my arms are quite hairy as well -LRB- I do n't shave or bleach them but I am self conscious -RRB- , so I 'd love to be hair free forever .

example.name: both args
example.text: I am self-conscious of my voice.
